original_title: صمد و سامی، لیلا و لیلی
overview: Samad (Parviz Sayad) and Leila (Shahnaz Tehrani) live in the village and two other people, who look exactly like them, named Sami and Laili, live in the city and... we can say that this story is a humorous adaptation of the movie Reza is a motorist.
tagline: Samad and Sami, Leyla and Lili
title: Samad and Sami, Leyla and Lili
